entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
